\NeedsTeXFormat{LaTeX2e}
\documentclass{minimal}
\usepackage{textcomp}
\usepackage{qstest}
\usepackage[warning,ucs]{selinput}
\SelectInputMappings{%
    adieresis=^^c3^^a4,%
    germandbls=^^c3^^9f,%
    Euro=^^e2^^82^^ac,%
}
\begin{qstest}{encoding}{}
  \Expect*{\inputencodingname}{utf8x}%
\end{qstest}
\begin{document}
  adieresis=^^c3^^a4, %
  germandbls=^^c3^^9f, %
  Euro=^^e2^^82^^ac%
\end{document}
\endinput
